Income tax accounts for about a 3rd of Government revenue.By increasing Indirect taxes and reducing gov expenditure of a much larger amount this tax can be abolished altogether.A smaller government/state could afford to remove this tax.
   Why except a tax on our incomes?It distorts our citizens expenditure patterns,gives the gov. an excuse to keep files on all of us and generally removes/impedes our general freedoms.All citizens would be free from government oppression  and the Inland Revenue much smaller if there was no income tax.
